title: How to Make a Black Tooth Grin

steps.title: Consider filling a shot glass with a few ice cubes.
steps.content: Consider filling a shot glass with a few ice cubes. The Black Tooth Grin is typically served chilled or over ice. If you don't want yours that cold, skip the ice.

steps.title: Fill the glass with 1½ ounces (45 milliliters) of Crown Royal Canadian whisky.
steps.content: Fill the glass with 1½ ounces (45 milliliters) of Crown Royal Canadian whisky. For a stronger drink, use 2 ounces (60 milliliters) instead. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Add half the Coca-Cola.
steps.content: Add half the Coca-Cola. You'll add the rest later.

steps.title: Pour in 1½ ounces (45 milliliters) of Seagram's 7 whisky.
steps.content: Pour in 1½ ounces (45 milliliters) of Seagram's 7 whisky. For a stronger drink, use 2 ounces (45 milliliters) instead. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Top off with the rest of the Coca-Cola.
steps.content: Top off with the rest of the Coca-Cola. This will turn the drink its trademark dark color.

steps.title: Serve.
steps.content: Serve. The Black Tooth Grin is served as is, without any garnishes.

steps.title: Try a simple Black Tooth Grin, without the Seagram's 7 whisky.
steps.content: Try a simple Black Tooth Grin, without the Seagram's 7 whisky. Fill a shot glass with 1½ ounces (45 milliliters) of Crown Royal Canadian whisky. Add a splash of Coca-Cola to turn the drink's color. Serve and enjoy. Serve this over ice for an added chill. This is also known as the Crown and Coke.

steps.title: Try it with Jack Daniel's and Coca-Cola.
steps.content: Try it with Jack Daniel's and Coca-Cola. Will a shot glass with 1 ounce (30 milliliters) of Jack Daniel's whiskey. Add a splash of Coca-Cola to turn the drink a darker color. Serve immediately. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Skip the Coca-Cola, and use a mixture of alcohols instead.
steps.content: Skip the Coca-Cola, and use a mixture of alcohols instead. Fill a cocktail shaker 2/3 of the way with ice. Add ½ ounce (15 milliliters) of each of the following: Goldschlager Cinnamon Schnapps, Jagermeister herbal liqueur, and Rumple Minze Schnapps. Shake for a few seconds, then strain into a chilled shot glass. Serve and enjoy.

steps.title: Use Amaretto Di Saronno liqueur instead of Seagram's 7 to make an Everhart.
steps.content: Use Amaretto Di Saronno liqueur instead of Seagram's 7 to make an Everhart. Fill a highball glass with ice. Add 1 ounce (30 milliliters) of Crown Royal, 1 ounce (30 milliliters) of Amaretto Di Saronno, and 2 ounces (60 milliliters) of Coca-Cola. Serve and enjoy.

steps.title: Use Captain Morgan spiced rum instead of the Seagram's 7 to make a Pirate's Treasure.
steps.content: Use Captain Morgan spiced rum instead of the Seagram's 7 to make a Pirate's Treasure. Fill a glass with 2 ounces (60 milliliters) of Captain Morgan's spiced rum, 1½ ounces (45 milliliters) of Crown Royal, and 12 ounces (355 milliliters) of Coca-Cola. Serve immediately.
